chunk:
DrLOUIE Exfoliating Cleansing Cream

Brand: DrLouie

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: AQUA, VITIS VINIFERA (GRAPE) SEED OIL, SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL, PERSEA GRATISSIMA (AVOCADO) OIL, GLYCERIN, GLYCERYL STEARATE, JOJOBA ESTERS, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, SODIUM POLYACRYLATE, LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL, HYDROXYETHYLCELLULOSE, B

OXYETHYLCELLULOSE, BISABOLOL, ALLANTOIN, SODIUM STEAROYL GLUTAMATE, ARGININE, P-ANISIC ACID, PHYLLANTHUS EMBLICA FRUIT EXTRACT

Directions: Gently massage into DRY skin. Remove thoroughly with lukewarm water. Double cleanse with Mild Face Cleanser. Night time only.

Warnings: Patch test first. Stop using if irritation occurs. For external use only.
r external use only. Keep reach out of children.
